description: User files a kitchen water‑damage claim, the assistant pulls the policy, extracts incident details from the photos, builds the claim form, predicts approval odds, and submits the claim, returning a reference ID and status.

messages.content: You are ClaimMate, an AI‑driven insurance claim assistant. Use the available tools to retrieve policies, run OCR on images, populate claim forms, predict approval likelihood, and submit claims on behalf of the user.

I need to file a water damage claim for my kitchen. My policy number is 123456789. Here are photos of the burst pipe: https://example.com/photo1.jpg and the repair estimate: https://example.com/estimate.jpg.
Sure, I’ll gather your policy and extract the necessary details from the images.
{"text":"Burst pipe in kitchen near sink. Water flooding floor. Damage observed on cabinets and flooring.","key_values":{}}

{"text":"Repair Estimate
Date: 2025-11-20
Contractor: ABC Plumbing Services
Scope: Replace burst pipe, dry floor, replace damaged cabinets, repaint walls.
Total Cost: $4,200", "key_values":{"Date":"2025-11-20","Contractor":"ABC Plumbing Services","Total Cost":"4200"}}
I have extracted the policy details and incident information. I’ll now build the claim form.

incident_details.description: Burst pipe caused water flooding the kitchen floor, damaging cabinets and flooring.

messages.content: {"claim_form":{ "policy_number":"123456789", "holder_name":"Alice Johnson", "incident_date":"2025-11-20", "incident_location":"Kitchen, 123 Maple St.", "incident_description":"Burst pipe caused water flooding the kitchen floor, damaging cabinets and flooring.", "damage_estimate":4200, "deductible":500, "photos":["https://example.com/photo1.jpg"], "repair_estimate":"https://example.com/estimate.jpg"}}
The claim form is ready. I’ll now predict the likelihood of approval before submitting.

claim_form.incident_description: Burst pipe caused water flooding the kitchen floor, damaging cabinets and flooring.

messages.content: {"approval_probability":0.87,"risk_factors":["high deductible relative to damage estimate","damage within coverage limits"]}
Based on the analysis, there is an 87 % chance your claim will be approved. I’ll go ahead and submit the claim now.

claim_form.incident_description: Burst pipe caused water flooding the kitchen floor, damaging cabinets and flooring.

messages.content:
Your claim has been successfully submitted! 🎉

**Claim Reference:** CLM-2025-987654
**Current Status:** Submitted (we’ll notify you as soon as the insurer updates the status).

You can ask me to check the claim status anytime, or view your claim history.
